extracted-table.table-caption: Results show functional connectivity differences between the two groups for the regions that survived post hoc correction for multiple comparisons using the false discovery rate method (FDR-corrected p values provided). x, y, and z coordinates of each target ROI are also shown, representing the centroid of the ROI. A two-sample t-test is calculated for resting state functional connectivity between the groups for the following ROIs.

caption.p: Results show functional connectivity differences between the two groups for the regions that survived post hoc correction for multiple comparisons using the false discovery rate method (FDR-corrected p values provided). x, y, and z coordinates of each target ROI are also shown, representing the centroid of the ROI. A two-sample t-test is calculated for resting state functional connectivity between the groups for the following ROIs.

tr.th: Insomnia group (vibroacoustic stimulation vs. control group/pre vs. post)
